name: Filter
description: Filter incoming messages based on regex

config.name: ignoreAddress
config.label: Ignore Address
config.description: If message address matches regex pattern, stop processing and ignore

config.name: ignoreMessage
config.label: Ignore Message
config.description: If message content matches regex pattern, stop processing and ignore

config.name: ignoreallbutAddress
config.label: Ignore all except Address
config.description: If message adress does not match regex pattern, stop processing and ignore

config.name: ignoreallbutMessage
config.label: Ignore all except Message
config.description: If message content does not match regex pattern, stop processing and ignore
